CustomField.description: A generic product whose name (example: Avalara Tax) populates the product field on the calculated Avalara tax line. This should be assigned a $0.00 standard price and added to a price book.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A generic product whose name (example: Avalara Tax) populates the product field on the calculated Avalara tax line. This should be assigned a $0.00 standard price and added to a price book.
CustomField.label: Avalara Tax Product
